name: anixe Polska
overview:
Anixe was founded in 1997 by Piotr Zolnierek and Radoslaw Tomczyk, delivering one of the very first AIR IBE in Europe (solution based on Worldspan and screen scraping, as no API was available at that time). Anixe supplies travel and tourism industry with state of the arts internet booking engines and management tools. Our true core product is however not the IBEs itself, but bookings we deliver for our clients. Main offering of Anixe is an internet booking engine suite, Resfinity.

Resfinity allows the airline to manage all stages of sales process from preparation through sales and post-sales service to reporting and analysis.

Its functionality allows providers management (multi-provider capabilities), distribution channels management (B2C, B2B, B2T, RBE (Redemption)), product and price management, online sales (air, car, hotel, insurance, dynamic packages) including cross-sale and up-sale, post-sales service plus reporting and analytical tools. Resfinity has extensive configuration capabilities to allow fast and easy adjustment to specific client’s needs including look&feel, content/translation, currency and price management.

Resfinity is offered on software as a service basis to assure worry-free solution for our clients. Anixe also offers integration services, custom development, software and hardware maintenance, technical support as well as consultancy services.

Since being founded in 1997, anixe Polska, has supplied its products to over 300 clients, including airlines, global distribution systems (GDS), travel agents, tour operators and internet portals. Companies that trusted anixe include AERticket, airline direct, Frosch Touristik FTI, Traveltopia, TAP Portugal, LOT Polish Airlines, Amadeus Polska, billigflug.deatr24.de, vola.ro, ticket easy, cheapfares.de, tripado.

Anixe owns (100% of shares) one subsidiary company Conso sp. z o.o., founded in 2010, integrating and distributing hotel transactions and offering fulfillment of hotel bookings. We are building synergies around IBE and hotel business offering great ancillary revenue opportunities to our clients.

In 2010 Anixe was awarded by Deloitte in Technology Fast 50 Program in Central Europe taking 9th position in Poland and 38th in overall qualification.

For more information, go to http://www.anixe.pl/en/
